text.author: wikipedia
text.title: Matthew Goode
text.summary: Matthew Goode is an English actor known for his roles in the romantic comedy Chasing Liberty (2004) and Burning Man (2011), as well as television roles including in the series Downton Abbey and The Good Wife.
